---
title: Quarto Projects Overview
---

We've seen how Quarto can render the same document containing different programming languages to several different formats using `quarto render`.
In this next section, we'll move from rendering a single document to rendering a book from a collection of documents using Quarto projects.
This tutorial will cover:

* Initializing a Quarto project
* Adding documents to the project
* How to render the project
* Configuring project-wide settings
* Other output formats

:::{.callout-note}
If this is your first time using Quarto, we recommend beginning with the [Getting Started](../getting_started/overview.qmd) section.
:::
